name: Lycanthrope
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn't kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Lycanthrope points to a player. If that player is good: they die and the Demon does not act tonight.

otherNights.description: Each night, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

information.customMessage: Choose a player; if good, they die and Demon does not kill.
